org.apache.flink.runtime.operators

Interface PactTaskContext<S,OT>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The UDF type.
    OT - The produced data type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIterativePactTask, IterationHeadPactTask, IterationIntermediatePactTask, IterationTailPactTask, RegularPactTask

    public interface PactTaskContext<S,OT>
    A runtime task is the task that is executed by the flink engine inside a task vertex. It typically has a PactDriver, and optionally multiple chained drivers. In addition, it deals with the runtime setup and teardown and the control-flow logic. The later appears especially in the case of iterations.
    See Also:
    PactDriver
